comments.body: I think it should be `webhook.admission.apiserver.k8s.io`, just like you put in the comment `// +groupName=webhook.admission.apiserver.k8s.io`. The name should be plugin-specific.

> I think it should be webhook.admission.apiserver.k8s.io, just like you put in the comment // +groupName=webhook.admission.apiserver.k8s.io. The name should be plugin-specific.

The type is specific, but the group is consistent with our discussion here: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/55812#discussion_r151370163
